review: The device is very good, it's fast and powerful for such a small device. It's definitely better that google chromecast. And more powerful than Roku stick.
author: Ninjas

review: I have used many devices like this and being able to mirror devices to the firestick plus it searching all attached services when I am looking for something specific is very nice. I liked it so much I bought two. Occasionally on long use the video would begin to break up some. Just unplug it for 10-15 minutes and it should begin working like a champ again.

review: Works as advertised. Kodi runs great. great wireless connection. easy to use.
author: Amazon Customer

review: An update on my Amazon Firestick. I was happy with it in the beginning, set up with no problem, connected to my internet instantly.Now I am constantly getting the message "Home is Currently Unavailable"  Go to network settings. When I check my network it shows signal strength "Very Good" and that I'm connected. So why am I losing the shows I'm watching, what does it mean that Home is unavailable? I have unplugged the Firestick, I am using the adapter, this is getting very frustrating.
